about_the_game:
*Game IS in development, but due to personal circumstances, it takes longer than expected*
Check the Youtube Channel for most recent updates!

Holum Island, Island of Unspeakable Horrors, the Structureworld...... for centuries, stories have been told about an island in the mist. An island of death and despair, only be found by people stuck in the massive storms that threaten this part of the sea.
But there is one name everybody knows: Skull Island.

Jump into this Single Player Hardcore Survival game that lets you explore a new interpretation of Skull Island like you have never seen before!
With building mechanics that let you set traps, build small shelters, gather food and resources, this survival game gives you the freedom to explore and settle on the Coastal Area of Skull Island filled with prehistoric wild life but evolved, dinosaurs and fantasy creatures based on the location of the island.

The game heavily focusses on a semi-open world filled with creatures from big to really small to make it feel more alive.
Each creature has his own place in the ecosystem, with AI focussed on this aspect.
It is possible to overhunt animals(for a short time) because of the spawning system and animals will react to your way of hunting.
The game also features a dynamic weather system that will not only impact the spawnrates of certain animals, but will also result in respawning of resources given to you by the sea.
Sometimes it is better to start running instead of fighting the many hostile animals on the island.
They will crawl from caves, fall from the basalt cliffs, attack you from above and... from carcasses?

The game will also be released with a gore-censor option for youtube(to prevent demonetization).

content_descriptors.notes:
Fictional Mushrooms to heal/fix certain stats for the player.

Dead carcasses of (fictional) (sea) creatures but can be toggled off to prevent demonetization on Youtube!

name: The Structureworld: Myths of Skull Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz 3.41 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Just like Minecraft, Java & OpenGL is needed to run
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700 CPU @ 3.40GHz 3.41 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Just like Minecraft, Java & OpenGL is needed to run

short_description: Survive in this epic semi-open world Survival Game on a new interpretation of Skull Island filled with your biggest nightmares! Build small bases, resource holders, traps and barricades to fight off the horrors and the simulated ecosystem of the island.
